buildings.name: Fire Pit
buildings.description: Burn wood to create light and warmth. Firemakers produce charcoal and bonfires.

tiers.flavorText: Eternal flames devour all who oppose you.
A fiery aura burns those who strike you.
Molten vengeance sears all who touch you.
Wreathed in hellfire, attackers are incinerated.
Strike with fury while at full strength.
Your healthy vigor ignites powerful strikes.
Slaying enemies empowers you with flames.
Slaying enemies ignites a star's heart within.
Devastating fire erupts on critical strikes.
Eternal flames make you immune to darkness.
